title: PYBIND_MODULE is broken: error: expected constructor, destructor, or type conversion before '(' token
body_html:
The break occurred between torch_nightly-1.0.0.dev20180924-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl and torch_nightly-1.0.0.dev20180925-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl. The error is:

    horovod/torch/mpi_ops_v2.cc:236:16: error: expected constructor, destructor, or type conversion before '(' token
     PYBIND11_MODULE(mpi_lib_v2, m) {
                    ^
    error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1

cc @soumith
body_text:

body:
The break occurred between torch_nightly-1.0.0.dev20180924-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl and torch_nightly-1.0.0.dev20180925-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl.  The error is:
```
    horovod/torch/mpi_ops_v2.cc:236:16: error: expected constructor, destructor, or type conversion before '(' token
     PYBIND11_MODULE(mpi_lib_v2, m) {
                    ^
    error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1
```

cc @soumith
